name: Orbcity
description: Orbcity, Koreaâ€™s largest web3.0 metaverse platform, is building a creator economy that artists and community can connect to build their metaverse while earning rewards. Orbcity helps web3.0 users to build their identity on a mirrored dimension of the Earth, exchange NFTs, share stories and participate in opportunistic deals. Our vision is to democratize social and financial access in the Metaverse. Orbcity is backed by leading investors including Krust, Animoca Brands, Naverz, RoK Capital and OKX Blockdream Ventures.
